resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103563</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103563</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205571</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Chichewa Tutor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chichewa Referent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Précepteur de Chichewa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tutor De Chichewa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Insegnante privato Di Chichewa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δάσκαλος Chichewa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Profesor particular De Chichewa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Chichewa, an official language of Malawi, is a language of the Bantu language family widely spoken in south-central Africa. Use this module to learn Chichewa. The module is very small, but hopefully it will get bigger.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chichewa, eine Amtssprache von Malawi, ist eine 
Sprache der Bantu Sprachenfamilie, die weit in Süden-zentralem Afrika
gesprochen wird. Benutzen Sie dieses Modul, um Chichewa zu 
erlernen. Das Modul ist sehr klein, aber hoffnungsvoll erhält 
es grösser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chichewa, une langue officielle du Malawi, est un 
langage de la famille bantoue de langage largement parlée dans 
sud-central Afrique. Utilisez ce module pour apprendre 
Chichewa. Le module est très petit, mais si tout va bien il 
deviendra plus grand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chichewa, uma língua oficial de Malawi, é uma 
língua da família Bantu da língua falada extensamente em África 
sul-central. Use este módulo aprender Chichewa. O módulo
é muito pequeno, mas esperançosamente começará mais grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chichewa, una lingua ufficiale del Malawi, è un 
linguaggio della famiglia Bantù di linguaggio ampiamente parlata in 
Africa sud-centrale. Utilizzi questo modulo per imparare 
Chichewa. Il modulo è molto piccolo, ma eventualmente otterrà 
più grande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Chichewa, μια επίσημη γλώσσα του Μαλάουι, είναι 
μια γλώσσα της bantu γλωσσικής οικογένειας ομιλούμενης ευρέως 
στην νότος-κεντρική Αφρική. Χρησιμοποιήστε αυτήν την 
ενότητα για να μάθετε Chichewa. Η ενότητα είναι πολύ 
μικρή, αλλά ενδεχομένως θα πάρει μεγαλύτερη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Chichewa, un lenguaje oficial de Malawi, es un 
lenguaje de la familia bantu del lenguaje hablada extensamente en 
África sur-central. Utilice este módulo para aprender 
Chichewa. El módulo es muy pequeño, pero esperanzadamente 
conseguirá más grande.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:PHILIP ANDERSEN
FN:PHILIP ANDERSEN
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205571</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103563</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/chichewa-tutor</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
